Package Game.Interfaces

Interface Room

All Superinterfaces:
Comparable<Room>
All Known Implementing Classes:
RoomImp
public interface Room extends Comparable<Room>
Represents a room in the game

      Returns a list of all enemies in the room.
      Returns:
      a LinkedUnorderedList of all enemies

    • removeEnemy

      void removeEnemy(Enemy enemy) throws EnemyException
      Removes an enemy from the room.
      Parameters:
      enemy - the enemy to remove
      Throws:
      EnemyException - if the enemy is not found in the room

    • setEntryAndExit

      void setEntryAndExit()
      Setter for the room's entry and exit status.

    • getTotalEnemiesAttackPower

      double getTotalEnemiesAttackPower()
      Calculates the total attack power of all enemies in the room that are still alive.

      Iterates through the list of enemies in the room and sums up the attack power of each enemy whose health is greater than zero.

      Returns:
      the total attack power of all living enemies in the room.

    • addEnemy

      void addEnemy(Enemy enemy) throws EnemyException
      Adds an enemy to the room
      Parameters:
      enemy - the enemy to add
      Throws:
      EnemyException - if the enemy is invalid or null

    • removeItems

      void removeItems(Hero hero) throws ItemException, HeroException, RoomException
      Removes an item from the room
      Parameters:
      hero - the hero to add the item to ( backPack or add to armor bar)
      Throws:
      ItemException - if the item is invalid or null
      HeroException - if the hero backpack is full
      RoomException - if the room doesn't have any items
